data.title: Final Fantasy XIII Original Soundtrack [Limited Edition]
data.meta_description: Final Fantasy XIII Original Soundtrack [Limited Edition]Catalog Number SQEX-10178~82Release Date Jan 27, 2010Publish Format Commercial, Limited EditionRelease Price 5250 JPYMedia Format 5 CDClassification Original Soundtrack, Vocal, DramaPublished by
data.text:
Catalog Number SQEX-10178~82

Release Date Jan 27, 2010

Publish Format Commercial, Limited Edition

Release Price 5250 JPY

Media Format 5 CD

Classification Original Soundtrack, Vocal, Drama

Published by Square Enix (distributed by Sony Music Distribution)

Composed by Masashi Hamauzu

Arranged by Masashi Hamauzu, Junya Nakano, Mitsuto Suzuki, Ryo Yamazaki, Toshiyuki Oomori, Toru Tabei, Kunihito Shiina, Yoshihisa Hirano, Sin

Performed by Frances Maya, Mina, Matsue Hamauzu, Yuichiro Goto Strings Group, Takashi Kato Strings Group, Kimiko Nakagawa Strings Group, Hijiri Kuwano, Kimiko Nakagawa, Yoko Ara, Futoshi Kobayashi, Hiroshi Hashimoto, Shigeo Okura, Osamu Kumashiro, Kunihiro Nakazato, Yasuhito Ota, Hiroyuki Suga, Koichi Nonoshita, Yoshiki Hakoyama, Hisato Yamaguchi, Takumi Shinozaki, Haruki Kishira, Takahide Furusho, Hirofumi Mori, Tsutomu Isohata, Hiroyuki Minami, You Okamura, Hiroyuki Nakajima, Hisashi Ise, Sumiharu Arima, Atsushi Doyama, Isao Watanabe, Kazuhiko Sato, Yoshiki Kashitani, Ippiqui Takemoto, Mari Kotake, Marie Oishi, Hideyo Takakuwa, Takashi Asahi, Maiko Seino, Kazuhiro Iwasa, Itaru Masumoto, Mitsuru Soma, Masayo Tabei, Tomofumi Shoji, Tomoka Hirota, Masashi Togame, Yoshihide Kiryu, Tomoyuki Asakawa, Dai Sakakibara, Shinko Ogata, Nobuo Kurata, Hiroshi Imade, Yoshitaka Kuratomi, Toru Tabei, Masayuki Chiyo, Tsuyoshi Sekito, Satoshi Akamatsu, Yusuke Saito, Hitoshi Watanabe, Tappi Iwase, AYA, Warsaw Philharmonic Orchestra, Warsaw Philharmonic Choir, Sayuri Sugawara, Maaya Sakamoto, Daisuke Ono, Minako Kotobuki, Yuki Kaji, Yukari Fukui, Mabuki Andou, Yuuji Ueda, Yuu Asakawa, Wataru Hatano, Biichi Sato, Makoto Naruse, Komina Matsushita, Miru Hitotsuyanagi, Masao Komaya, Kenji Takahashi

Lyrics by Motomu Toriyama, Frances Maya, Phillip Dale Bright, Tom Slattery, Dr. Volker Ahlemeyer, Yukino Nakajima, Sayuri Sugawara
